text:
Stellar PR has engaged Sarah Chen to provide expertise for the New beauty Series on behalf of Seed Heritage. As consumers increasingly seek sustainable products, Australians are seeking better beauty solutions. As the campaign's brand partner, Sarah Chen will deliver core messaging across media and social channels. This campaign reinforces the brand's leadership in beauty.

INFLUENCER AGREEMENT

This agreement is between Seed Heritage and the Influencer for Seed Heritage Wellness Campaign 2025.

COMMERCIAL TERMS:
- Total Fee: $10,062 AUD (inclusive of GST)
- Payment Terms: Net 30 days from invoice date
- Invoice Requirements: Tax invoice required upon completion

DELIVERABLES:
- 3 x Instagram posts

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- Engagement Period: 3 months
- Exclusivity Period: 4 weeks
- Territory: Australia
- Usage Rights: 12 months from campaign launch
- Content Rights: Seed Heritage retains full commercial rights

COMPLIANCE:
- All content must comply with ACMA guidelines and ASA codes
- Content is subject to client approval before publication
- Disclosure requirements must be met per ACCC guidelines

LEGAL:
This agreement is governed by Australian law and subject to the jurisdiction of Australian courts.

Agreed terms are subject to final contract execution.
labels: profile_TKB Influencer Agreement - Dr Claire x Australia Post Dog Safety Campaign
